## LinearCardContainer.setOrientation() method

Sets whether the given card is face up or down.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setOrientation(card: TCard, orientation: CardOrientation): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  card | TCard | Card to set. |
|  orientation | [CardOrientation](./bge-core.cardorientation.md) | Orientation to set the card to. |

**Returns:**

void
